mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM, BOARD_NAME, BOARD_SUBJECT, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FREE_BOARD_REPLY WHERE BOARD_NUM = REPLY_NUM) AS REPLY_COUNT FROM FREE_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD VALUES ((select nvl(max(BOARD_NUM) + 1, 1) from FREE_BOARD), #{boardName}, #{boardSubject}, #{boardContent}, #{boardCount}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET BOARD_SUBJECT = #{boardSubject}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent} WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET BOARD_NUM = BOARD_NUM - 1 WHERE BOARD_NUM BETWEEN (#{boardNum} + 1) AND (select max(BOARD_NUM) from FREE_BOARD)
UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET BOARD_COUNT = (BOARD_COUNT + 1) WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FREE_BOARD_REPLY WHERE REPLY_NUM = #{boardNum}
SELECT REPLY_NUM, RELPY_LEVEL, RELPY_NAME, RELPY_CONTENT, REPLY_DATE FROM FREE_BOARD_REPLY WHERE REPLY_NUM = #{boardNum} ORDER BY RELPY_LEVEL ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD_REPLY VALUES (#{replyNum}, (select nvl(max(RELPY_LEVEL) + 1, 1) from FREE_BOARD_REPLY WHERE REPLY_NUM = #{replyNum}), #{replyName}, #{replyContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: DELETE FROM FREE_BOARD_REPLY WHERE REPLY_NUM = #{replyNum} AND RELPY_LEVEL = #{replyLevel}
UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET RELPY_LEVEL = RELPY_LEVEL - 1 WHERE BOARD_NUM BETWEEN (#{replyLevel} + 1) AND (select max(RELPY_LEVEL) from FREE_BOARD_REPLY)
